Keqing
Yuheng, Star of Change

Civilian units ignore all [ICON_Movement] Movement penalties for terrain and features. Builders and Military Engineers can immediately move after being purchased, and their [ICON_Movement] Movement is fully restored after performing their first build action.

Keqing, Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing, the future of Liyue lies in your hands. You are representation of your people, and make your decisions lightning fast like a driving thunder. Under your leadership, your people will rewrite the old order existed for millennia, replace the gods as masters of your own universe, and stand the test of time. Stay at the cutting edge in eras, create a new path with your own hands, and make your thoughts into actions.
Ningguang
Tianquan, All-Seeing Star

Receive an extra level of [ICON_VisLimited] Diplomatic Visibility when sending an international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route to another civilization. All spies start with the Surveillance promotion. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith, and +50% [ICON_Gold] Gold from international [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes.

Ningguang, Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing, you knows all details about good and bad things in Liyue. You are kind toward your people, but a perfect hunter that none of your enemy could ever hope to see, and unsurpassed in all of Teyvat. Continue investing, expand trade routes, and develop the Jade Chamber so that it can casts its shadow over the whole of Liyue in the moonlight.
